query: Create QA Round 1 for user authentication feature
expected_behavior: Searches for existing QA-ROUND-*.md files to determine round number
Reads implementation plan to extract features, acceptance criteria, platforms
Generates test scenarios from acceptance criteria in plan
Includes Issue Log table with ID, Summary, Affects, Status, Session columns
Uses unified state model ([OPEN], [IN PROGRESS], [READY TO TEST], [DONE])
Provides 4-phase workflow: Test & Log, Research, Plan & Fix, Verify
Includes Session Scope table and ready-to-use session prompts
Tailors to project's terminology, platforms, and patterns
Keeps round focused on single feature or tightly-related group
